response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be worth every penny to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $12,000. This price reflects a fair balance between the product's value and my goal to maximize its return. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier solution.", "product_price": 12000}
